EmailTemplate.description: Whitepaper - Activating Hybrid Cloud for Healthcare IT
EmailTemplate.name: NA_Enterprise_Health Care_Cold_Nurture.Healthcare_Cold_Nurture_Enterprise_ES_2
EmailTemplate.subject: [EBook] Activating Hybrid Cloud for Healthcare Providers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/activating-hybrid-cloud-for-healthcare-it/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Two major trends are prevalent in today’s healthcare IT environments: the digitation of medical records through Electronic Medical/Health Records and the centralization of access via virtual desktops. While the forces driving these adoption, curves vary across the globe, the challenges inherent in each trend are universal. How will your organization overcome them?
Download this EBook <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/activating-hybrid-cloud-for-healthcare-it/]]> to Learn:
- How to control EHR workloads in virtualized environments
- How to manage storage capacity for EMR/HER and PACS
- Scaling VDI securely while cutting costs
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/activating-hybrid-cloud-for-healthcare-it/]]>
Leveraging Turbonomic, the leading provider of workload automation, healthcare IT administrators can simultaneously optimize performance, cost, and compliance in real-time.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
